abilities.name: Cud Chew

abilities.name: Armor Tail

abilities.effect: Armor Tail prevents the opponent from using any moves that have priority, such as Quick Attack.

abilities.name: Sap Sipper

abilities.name: Inner Focus

abilities.name: Defiant

abilities.name: Water Veil
abilities.desc: Prevents burns.
abilities.effect: Prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.

abilities.name: Anticipation
abilities.desc: Senses the foe’s dangerous moves.
abilities.effect: A Pokémon with Anticipation will shudder upon entering battle, if an opponent has a move that is super-effective against it, or a One-Hit-KO move (Fissure, Horn Drill, Guillotine or Sheer Cold). It only activates when the ability-bearer switches in, not when an opponent switches in.

abilities.name: Frisk
abilities.desc: The Pokémon can check the foe’s held item.

abilities.effect: Raises one stat and lowers another.

abilities.effect: Stance Change is exclusive to Aegislash. When using a damage-dealing move, Aegislash switches to its Blade Forme. When using the move King's Shield, Aegislash switches to its Shield Forme.

abilities.effect: Psychic Surge creates a low-lying psychic field, like the move Psychic Terrain, when the Pokémon enters battle. It prevents high-priority moves being used and increases the power of Psychic type attacks.

abilities.name: Own Tempo
abilities.desc: Prevents confusion.
abilities.effect: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming confused.

abilities.name: Synchronize
abilities.desc: Passes on status problems.
abilities.effect: If the opponent causes a burn, paralysis, or poisoning of a Pokémon with Synchronize, the opponent receives the status condition too. Self-inflicted status conditions (for example through the use of an item) are not passed on.

abilities.name: Psychic Surge

abilities.effect: Psychic Surge creates a low-lying psychic field, like the move Psychic Terrain, when the Pokémon enters battle. It prevents high-priority moves being used and increases the power of Psychic type attacks.

abilities.name: Prankster
abilities.desc: Gives priority to a status move.
abilities.effect: Prankster increases the priority of status moves by +1.

abilities.effect: The Pokémon can check a foe's held item.

abilities.desc: Senses the foe’s dangerous moves.
abilities.effect: A Pokémon with Anticipation will shudder upon entering battle, if an opponent has a move that is super-effective against it, or a One-Hit-KO move (Fissure, Horn Drill, Guillotine or Sheer Cold). It only activates when the ability-bearer switches in, not when an opponent switches in.

abilities.name: Magic Bounce
abilities.desc: Reflects status-changing moves.
abilities.effect: Reflects status- changing moves.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.desc: Raises SPEED in rain.
abilities.effect: Swift Swim doubles the ability-bearer's Speed during rain.

abilities.name: Adaptability
abilities.desc: Powers up moves of the same type.
abilities.effect: Adaptability increases the effectiveness of STAB moves from the usual 1.5× to 2×.

abilities.name: Mold Breaker
abilities.desc: Moves can be used regardless of abilities.
abilities.effect: Mold Breaker prevents a target's ability from affecting moves that the Mold Breaker Pokémon uses. It only affects abilities that change the power, accuracy or other effects of moves.

abilities.name: Rattled
abilities.desc: Some move types scare it and boost its Speed.
abilities.effect: When a Pokémon with Rattled is hit by a Bug, Ghost or Dark type move, its Speed is raised one stage (up to the usual maximum of +6 stages).

abilities.name: Static
abilities.desc: Paralyzes on contact.
abilities.effect: If a Pokémon with Static is hit by a move making contact, there is a 30% chance the foe will become paralyzed.

abilities.name: Klutz
abilities.desc: The Pokémon can’t use any held items.
abilities.effect: The Pokémon can't use any held items.

abilities.name: Reckless
abilities.desc: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.
abilities.effect: Reckless increases the power of recoil moves by 20%. By extension, this means the amount of recoil damage taken will increase as more damage is dealt (except for High Jump Kick and Jump Kick which are based on the user's HP).

abilities.name: Guts
abilities.desc: Ups ATTACK if suffering.
abilities.effect: Guts raises the ability-bearer's Attack by 50% when inflicted by a major status ailment (poison, burn, paralysis, freeze or sleep). If burnt, the Pokémon does not suffer the usual drop in Attack.

abilities.name: Defiant
abilities.desc: When its stats are lowered its Attack increases.
abilities.effect: Defiant raises the ability-bearer's Attack by two stages when hit by a stat-lowering move.

abilities.name: Flash Fire
abilities.desc: Powers up if hit by fire.
abilities.effect: When a Pokémon with Flash Fire is hit by a Fire-type move, it does not deal damage but instead raises the power of the bearer's Fire-type moves by 50%. Subsequent hits do not raise the power even more, but the effect remains while the ability-bearer is in battle.

abilities.name: White Smoke
abilities.desc: Prevents ability reduction.
abilities.effect: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

abilities.name: Flame Body
abilities.desc: Burns the foe on contact.
abilities.effect: If a Pokémon with Flame Body is hit by a move that makes contact, there is a 30% chance the attacker will become burned.

abilities.name: Overcoat
abilities.desc: Protects the Pokémon from damage from weather.
abilities.effect: Overcoat makes the Pokémon immune to residual damage from weather conditions (specifically Hail and Sandstorm).

abilities.effect: Reckless increases the power of recoil moves by 20%. By extension, this means the amount of recoil damage taken will increase as more damage is dealt (except for High Jump Kick and Jump Kick which are based on the user's HP).

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.desc: Not hit by GROUND attacks.
abilities.effect: Levitate causes the Pokémon to be raised (like Flying-type Pokémon).

abilities.name: Big Pecks
abilities.desc: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering attacks.
abilities.effect: Big Pecks prevents the ability-bearer's Defense stat from being lowered, for example via Tail Whip.

abilities.name: Overcoat
abilities.desc: Protects the Pokémon from damage from weather.
abilities.effect: Overcoat makes the Pokémon immune to residual damage from weather conditions (specifically Hail and Sandstorm).

abilities.name: Weak Armor
abilities.desc: Physical attacks lower Defense and raise Speed.
abilities.effect: When a Pokémon with Weak Armor is hit by a physical move, its Defense drops one stage, but its Speed increases by one stage.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.desc: Not hit by GROUND attacks.
abilities.effect: Levitate causes the Pokémon to be raised (like Flying-type Pokémon).

abilities.name: Iron Fist
abilities.desc: Boosts the power of punching moves.
abilities.effect: Iron Fist increases the power of all punching moves by 20%.

abilities.name: Klutz
abilities.desc: The Pokémon can’t use any held items.
abilities.effect: The Pokémon can't use any held items.

abilities.name: No Guard
abilities.desc: Ensures the Pokémon and its foe’s attacks land.
abilities.effect: No Guard ensures that all attacks used by, and targeted at, the ability-bearer hit without fail.

abilities.name: Reckless
abilities.desc: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.
abilities.effect: Reckless increases the power of recoil moves by 20%. By extension, this means the amount of recoil damage taken will increase as more damage is dealt (except for High Jump Kick and Jump Kick which are based on the user's HP).

abilities.name: Sap Sipper
abilities.desc: Boosts Attack when hit by a Grass-type move.
abilities.effect: Boosts Attack when hit by a Grass-type move.

abilities.name: Soundproof
abilities.desc: Avoids sound-based moves.
abilities.effect: Soundproof grants the Pokémon immunity to all sound-based moves, preventing all damage and effects.

abilities.name: Defiant
abilities.desc: When its stats are lowered its Attack increases.
abilities.effect: Defiant raises the ability-bearer's Attack by two stages when hit by a stat-lowering move.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.desc: Prevents flinching.
abilities.effect: Inner Focus prevents the Pokémon from flinching, for example when attacked by a move like Headbutt.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.desc: Raises foe’s PP usage.
abilities.effect: Pressure makes any attack targeted at the ability-bearer - regardless of whether it hits - use 2 PP instead of 1.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.desc: Makes escaping easier.
abilities.effect: Run Away allows the bearer to flee a battle with a wild Pokémon without fail, even if the opposing Pokémon has used a move like Mean Look or Bind, or has an ability such as Arena Trap.

abilities.name: Guts
abilities.desc: Ups ATTACK if suffering.
abilities.effect: Guts raises the ability-bearer's Attack by 50% when inflicted by a major status ailment (poison, burn, paralysis, freeze or sleep). If burnt, the Pokémon does not suffer the usual drop in Attack.

abilities.name: Hustle
abilities.desc: Trades accuracy for power.
abilities.effect: Hustle increases the ability-bearer's Attack by 50%, however, it also reduces the Accuracy of all Physical moves by 20%.

abilities.name: Gluttony
abilities.desc: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.
abilities.effect: A Pokémon with Gluttony will use a pinch berry when its HP drops to 50%, rather than the usual 25%.

abilities.name: Hustle
abilities.desc: Trades accuracy for power.
abilities.effect: Hustle increases the ability-bearer's Attack by 50%, however, it also reduces the Accuracy of all Physical moves by 20%.

abilities.name: Thick Fat
abilities.desc: Heat-and-cold protection.
abilities.effect: Thick Fat reduces the damage taken from Fire-type and Ice-type moves by 50%.

abilities.name: Effect Spore
abilities.desc: Leaves spores on contact.
abilities.effect: Contact may poison or cause paralysis or sleep.

abilities.name: Regenerator
abilities.desc: Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.
abilities.effect: A Pokémon with Regenerator restores 1⁄3 of its maximum HP when switching out.

abilities.name: Static
abilities.desc: Paralyzes on contact.
abilities.effect: If a Pokémon with Static is hit by a move making contact, there is a 30% chance the foe will become paralyzed.

abilities.name: Limber
abilities.desc: Prevents paralysis.
abilities.effect: The Pokémon is protected from paralysis.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.desc: Ups evasion in a sandstorm.
abilities.effect: Sand Veil raises the ability-bearer's evasion by 20% in a sandstorm. It also gives immunity to sandstorm damage (if they are not already protected by being Ground/Rock/Steel type).

abilities.name: Mimicry
abilities.desc: Changes the Pokémon’s type depending on the terrain.
abilities.effect: Changes type depending on the terrain.

abilities.name: Hydration
abilities.desc: Heals status problems if it is raining.
abilities.effect: A Pokémon with Hydration will cure itself of any status conditions during rain, at the end of each turn. This includes self-inflicted conditions such as from using Rest.

abilities.name: Shell Armor
abilities.desc: Blocks critical hits.
abilities.effect: Shell Armor prevents the Pokémon from receiving a critical hit.

abilities.name: Overcoat
abilities.desc: Protects the Pokémon from damage from weather.
abilities.effect: Overcoat makes the Pokémon immune to residual damage from weather conditions (specifically Hail and Sandstorm).

abilities.name: Iron Barbs
abilities.desc: Inflicts damage to the Pokémon on contact.
abilities.effect: When a Pokémon with Iron Barbs is hit by a move that makes contact, the attacker receives damage equal to 1⁄8 of their maximum HP.

abilities.name: Anticipation
abilities.desc: Senses the foe’s dangerous moves.
abilities.effect: A Pokémon with Anticipation will shudder upon entering battle, if an opponent has a move that is super-effective against it, or a One-Hit-KO move (Fissure, Horn Drill, Guillotine or Sheer Cold). It only activates when the ability-bearer switches in, not when an opponent switches in.

abilities.effect: Sticky Hold prevents held items from being taken or switched.

abilities.desc: Raises Speed if a held item is used.

abilities.effect: Deals more damage to a Pokémon of same gender.

abilities.effect: Skill Link causes multi-strike moves to always hit their maximum number of times. The moves affected are listed below; note that moves such as Double Kick that always strike the same number of times are not affected.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.desc: Prevents loss of accuracy.
abilities.effect: Keen Eye prevents the Pokémon from losing accuracy, for example from moves like Sand-Attack.

abilities.name: Big Pecks
abilities.desc: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering attacks.
abilities.effect: Big Pecks prevents the ability-bearer's Defense stat from being lowered, for example via Tail Whip.

abilities.name: Hydration
abilities.desc: Heals status problems if it is raining.
abilities.effect: A Pokémon with Hydration will cure itself of any status conditions during rain, at the end of each turn. This includes self-inflicted conditions such as from using Rest.

abilities.name: Ice Body
abilities.desc: The Pokémon regains HP in a hailstorm.
abilities.effect: A Pokémon with Ice Body will recover 1⁄16 of its maximum HP during hail, after each turn. It also grants immunity to the hailstorm damage, if not already immune.

abilities.name: Snow Warning
abilities.desc: The Pokémon summons a hailstorm in battle.
abilities.effect: Snow Warning creates a hailstorm when the ability-bearer enters battle. The effect lasts 5 turns, unless it is cleared via Air Lock or Cloud Nine or replaced by another weather condition.

abilities.name: Weak Armor
abilities.desc: Physical attacks lower Defense and raise Speed.
abilities.effect: When a Pokémon with Weak Armor is hit by a physical move, its Defense drops one stage, but its Speed increases by one stage.

abilities.name: Defeatist
abilities.desc: Lowers stats when HP becomes half or less.
abilities.effect: When the HP of a Pokémon with Defeatist falls below 50%, its Attack and Special Attack stats are halved.

abilities.effect: When the HP of a Pokémon with Defeatist falls below 50%, its Attack and Special Attack stats are halved.

abilities.name: Mummy
abilities.desc: Contact with this Pokémon spreads this Ability.
abilities.effect: Contact with this Pokémon spreads this Ability.

abilities.name: Wandering Spirit
abilities.desc: The Pokémon exchanges Abilities with a Pokémon that hits it with a move that makes direct contact.
abilities.effect: Swaps abilities with opponents on contact.

abilities.name: Stench
abilities.desc: Helps repel wild POKéMON.
abilities.effect: A Pokémon with Stench has a 10% chance of causing the opponent to flinch when hit by a damaging move (provided the ability-bearer strikes first as usual).

abilities.name: Sticky Hold
abilities.desc: Prevents item theft.
abilities.effect: Sticky Hold prevents held items from being taken or switched.

abilities.name: Aftermath
abilities.desc: Damages the foe landing the finishing hit.
abilities.effect: If an attacker faints a Pokémon with Aftermath using a contact move, the attacker will lose 1⁄4 of their maximum HP.

abilities.name: Solid Rock
abilities.desc: Powers down supereffective moves.
abilities.effect: Solid Rock reduces the damage taken from super-effective attacks by 25%.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.desc: Negates 1-hit KO attacks.
abilities.effect: Sturdy allows the Pokémon to survive with 1 HP if attacked at full HP with an attack that would otherwise knock it out. It also prevents One-Hit-KO moves (Fissure, Horn Drill, Guillotine or Sheer Cold).

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.desc: Raises SPEED in rain.
abilities.effect: Swift Swim doubles the ability-bearer's Speed during rain.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.desc: Heals the body by shedding.
abilities.effect: The Pokémon may heal its own status problems.

abilities.name: Moxie
abilities.desc: Boosts Attack after knocking out any Pokémon.
abilities.effect: Moxie increases the user's Attack one stage upon fainting an opponent.

abilities.name: Intimidate
abilities.desc: Lowers the foe’s ATTACK.
abilities.effect: Intimidate lower's the Attack of all opponents by one stage when the ability-bearer switches in (including the start of a battle).

abilities.name: Wonder Skin
abilities.desc: Makes status-changing moves more likely to miss.
abilities.effect: Wonder Skin halves the accuracy of all status moves targeted at the ability-bearer.

abilities.desc: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.
abilities.effect: Magic Guard protects the Pokémon from indirect damage, including:

abilities.effect: Cloud Nine suppresses all effects brought on by weather, including move power increases, end-of-turn damage, accuracy changes, relevant abilities and so on.

abilities.name: Anticipation
abilities.desc: Senses the foe’s dangerous moves.
abilities.effect: A Pokémon with Anticipation will shudder upon entering battle, if an opponent has a move that is super-effective against it, or a One-Hit-KO move (Fissure, Horn Drill, Guillotine or Sheer Cold). It only activates when the ability-bearer switches in, not when an opponent switches in.

abilities.name: Dry Skin
abilities.desc: Reduces HP if it is hot. Water restores HP.
abilities.effect: Dry Skin causes several effects:

abilities.name: Poison Touch
abilities.desc: May poison targets when a Pokémon makes contact.
abilities.effect: May poison targets when a Pokémon makes contact.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.desc: Ups evasion in a sandstorm.
abilities.effect: Sand Veil raises the ability-bearer's evasion by 20% in a sandstorm. It also gives immunity to sandstorm damage (if they are not already protected by being Ground/Rock/Steel type).

abilities.name: Rough Skin
abilities.desc: Hurts to touch.
abilities.effect: When a Pokémon with Rough Skin is hit by a move that makes contact, the attacker receives damage equal to 1⁄8 of their maximum HP.

abilities.name: Sand Force
abilities.desc: Boosts certain moves’ power in a sandstorm.
abilities.effect: Sand Force raises the power of Ground, Rock and Steel type moves by 30% during a sandstorm.

abilities.name: Battle Armor
abilities.desc: Blocks critical hits.
abilities.effect: Battle Armor prevents the Pokémon from receiving a critical hit.

abilities.name: Sniper
abilities.desc: Powers up moves if they become critical hits.
abilities.effect: Sniper increases the power of critical hits by 1.5×. This means a critical hit will deal 2.25× normal damage instead of 1.5×.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.desc: Prevents loss of accuracy.
abilities.effect: Keen Eye prevents the Pokémon from losing accuracy, for example from moves like Sand-Attack.

abilities.name: Pickup
abilities.desc: May pick up items.
abilities.effect: When another Pokémon on the field uses a single-use held item, a Pokémon with Pickup will obtain the used item (if they are not already holding anything) and it can be used again.

abilities.name: Thick Fat
abilities.desc: Heat-and-cold protection.
abilities.effect: Thick Fat reduces the damage taken from Fire-type and Ice-type moves by 50%.

abilities.name: Gluttony
abilities.desc: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.
abilities.effect: A Pokémon with Gluttony will use a pinch berry when its HP drops to 50%, rather than the usual 25%.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.desc: Raises SPEED in rain.
abilities.effect: Swift Swim doubles the ability-bearer's Speed during rain.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.desc: Changes water into HP.
abilities.effect: A Pokémon with Water Absorb heals 1⁄4 of its maximum HP when hit by a Water-type attack.

abilities.name: Water Veil
abilities.desc: Prevents burns.
abilities.effect: Prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.

abilities.desc: Not hit by GROUND attacks.
abilities.effect: Levitate causes the Pokémon to be raised (like Flying-type Pokémon).

abilities.effect: Pressure makes any attack targeted at the ability-bearer - regardless of whether it hits - use 2 PP instead of 1.

abilities.desc: Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.
abilities.effect: A Pokémon with Regenerator restores 1⁄3 of its maximum HP when switching out.

abilities.name: Intimidate
abilities.desc: Lowers the foe’s ATTACK.
abilities.effect: Intimidate lower's the Attack of all opponents by one stage when the ability-bearer switches in (including the start of a battle).

abilities.name: Quick Feet
abilities.desc: Boosts Speed if there is a status problem.
abilities.effect: Quick Feet raises the ability-bearer's Speed by 50% when inflicted by a major status ailment (poison, burn, paralysis, freeze or sleep). If paralyzed, the Pokémon does not suffer the usual drop in Speed.

abilities.name: Moxie
abilities.desc: Boosts Attack after knocking out any Pokémon.
abilities.effect: Moxie increases the user's Attack one stage upon fainting an opponent.

abilities.effect: Sand Veil raises the ability-bearer's evasion by 20% in a sandstorm. It also gives immunity to sandstorm damage (if they are not already protected by being Ground/Rock/Steel type).

abilities.name: Immunity
abilities.desc: Prevents poisoning.
abilities.effect: Prevents the Pokémon from getting poisoned.

abilities.name: Hustle
abilities.desc: Trades accuracy for power.
abilities.effect: Hustle increases the ability-bearer's Attack by 50%, however, it also reduces the Accuracy of all Physical moves by 20%.

abilities.name: Natural Cure
abilities.desc: Heals upon switching out.
abilities.effect: All status problems heal when it switches out.

abilities.name: Regenerator
abilities.desc: Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.
abilities.effect: A Pokémon with Regenerator restores 1⁄3 of its maximum HP when switching out.

abilities.name: Weak Armor
abilities.desc: Physical attacks lower Defense and raise Speed.
abilities.effect: When a Pokémon with Weak Armor is hit by a physical move, its Defense drops one stage, but its Speed increases by one stage.

abilities.name: Cursed Body
abilities.desc: May disable a move used on the Pokémon.
abilities.effect: May disable a move used on the Pokémon.

abilities.name: Insomnia
abilities.desc: Prevents sleep.
abilities.effect: Insomnia prevents the ability-bearer from falling asleep, both from moves by other Pokémon like Sing, and self-inflicted sleep like Rest.

abilities.name: Super Luck
abilities.desc: Heightens the critical-hit ratios of moves.
abilities.effect: Super Luck raises the ability-bearer's critical-hit ratio by one stage (for most moves this increases from a 1⁄16 chance to 1⁄8).

abilities.name: Prankster
abilities.desc: Gives priority to a status move.
abilities.effect: Prankster increases the priority of status moves by +1.

abilities.name: Rock Head
abilities.desc: Prevents recoil damage.
abilities.effect: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.desc: Negates 1-hit KO attacks.
abilities.effect: Sturdy allows the Pokémon to survive with 1 HP if attacked at full HP with an attack that would otherwise knock it out. It also prevents One-Hit-KO moves (Fissure, Horn Drill, Guillotine or Sheer Cold).

abilities.name: Sheer Force
abilities.desc: Removes added effects to increase move damage.
abilities.effect: Sheer Force increases the power of moves that have beneficial secondary effects by 30%, but removes those additional effects.

abilities.name: Sand Force
abilities.desc: Boosts certain moves’ power in a sandstorm.
abilities.effect: Sand Force raises the power of Ground, Rock and Steel type moves by 30% during a sandstorm.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.desc: Prevents flinching.
abilities.effect: Inner Focus prevents the Pokémon from flinching, for example when attacked by a move like Headbutt.

abilities.name: Early Bird
abilities.desc: Awakens quickly from sleep.
abilities.effect: The Pokémon awakens quickly from sleep.

abilities.name: Sap Sipper
abilities.desc: Boosts Attack when hit by a Grass-type move.
abilities.effect: Boosts Attack when hit by a Grass-type move.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.desc: Ups BUG moves in a pinch.
abilities.effect: Swarm increases the power of Bug-type moves by 50% (1.5×) when the ability-bearer's HP falls below a third of its maximum (known in-game as in a pinch).

abilities.name: Guts
abilities.desc: Ups ATTACK if suffering.
abilities.effect: Guts raises the ability-bearer's Attack by 50% when inflicted by a major status ailment (poison, burn, paralysis, freeze or sleep). If burnt, the Pokémon does not suffer the usual drop in Attack.

abilities.name: Moxie
abilities.desc: Boosts Attack after knocking out any Pokémon.
abilities.effect: Moxie increases the user's Attack one stage upon fainting an opponent.

abilities.name: Skill Link
abilities.desc: Increases the frequency of multi-strike moves.
abilities.effect: Skill Link causes multi-strike moves to always hit their maximum number of times. The moves affected are listed below; note that moves such as Double Kick that always strike the same number of times are not affected.

abilities.name: Synchronize
abilities.desc: Passes on status problems.
abilities.effect: If the opponent causes a burn, paralysis, or poisoning of a Pokémon with Synchronize, the opponent receives the status condition too. Self-inflicted status conditions (for example through the use of an item) are not passed on.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.desc: Prevents flinching.
abilities.effect: Inner Focus prevents the Pokémon from flinching, for example when attacked by a move like Headbutt.

abilities.name: Static
abilities.desc: Paralyzes on contact.
abilities.effect: If a Pokémon with Static is hit by a move making contact, there is a 30% chance the foe will become paralyzed.

abilities.desc: Powers up with MINUS.
abilities.effect: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.

abilities.effect: Run Away allows the bearer to flee a battle with a wild Pokémon without fail, even if the opposing Pokémon has used a move like Mean Look or Bind, or has an ability such as Arena Trap.

abilities.effect: Cloud Nine suppresses all effects brought on by weather, including move power increases, end-of-turn damage, accuracy changes, relevant abilities and so on.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.desc: Raises SPEED in rain.
abilities.effect: Swift Swim doubles the ability-bearer's Speed during rain.

abilities.name: Vital Spirit
abilities.desc: Prevents sleep.
abilities.effect: Vital Spirit prevents the ability-bearer from falling asleep. This means that it also prevents the use of the move Rest.

abilities.name: Anger Point
abilities.desc: Raises Attack upon taking a critical hit.
abilities.effect: Anger Point raises the ability-bearer's Attack to its maximum level - +6 stages or 4× usual power - when a move targeting it receives a critical hit.

abilities.name: Defiant
abilities.desc: When its stats are lowered its Attack increases.
abilities.effect: Defiant raises the ability-bearer's Attack by two stages when hit by a stat-lowering move.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.desc: Makes escaping easier.
abilities.effect: Run Away allows the bearer to flee a battle with a wild Pokémon without fail, even if the opposing Pokémon has used a move like Mean Look or Bind, or has an ability such as Arena Trap.

abilities.name: Flash Fire
abilities.desc: Powers up if hit by fire.
abilities.effect: When a Pokémon with Flash Fire is hit by a Fire-type move, it does not deal damage but instead raises the power of the bearer's Fire-type moves by 50%. Subsequent hits do not raise the power even more, but the effect remains while the ability-bearer is in battle.

abilities.name: Flame Body
abilities.desc: Burns the foe on contact.
abilities.effect: If a Pokémon with Flame Body is hit by a move that makes contact, there is a 30% chance the attacker will become burned.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.desc: Makes escaping easier.
abilities.effect: Run Away allows the bearer to flee a battle with a wild Pokémon without fail, even if the opposing Pokémon has used a move like Mean Look or Bind, or has an ability such as Arena Trap.

abilities.name: Pastel Veil
abilities.desc: Protects the Pokémon and its ally Pokémon from being poisoned.
abilities.effect: Pastel Veil prevents the Pokémon and its teammates from being poisoned. It also cures teammates of poisoning when it enters the battlefield.

abilities.name: Anticipation
abilities.desc: Senses the foe’s dangerous moves.
abilities.effect: A Pokémon with Anticipation will shudder upon entering battle, if an opponent has a move that is super-effective against it, or a One-Hit-KO move (Fissure, Horn Drill, Guillotine or Sheer Cold). It only activates when the ability-bearer switches in, not when an opponent switches in.

abilities.name: Rock Head
abilities.desc: Prevents recoil damage.
abilities.effect: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.desc: Negates 1-hit KO attacks.
abilities.effect: Sturdy allows the Pokémon to survive with 1 HP if attacked at full HP with an attack that would otherwise knock it out. It also prevents One-Hit-KO moves (Fissure, Horn Drill, Guillotine or Sheer Cold).

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.desc: Ups evasion in a sandstorm.
abilities.effect: Sand Veil raises the ability-bearer's evasion by 20% in a sandstorm. It also gives immunity to sandstorm damage (if they are not already protected by being Ground/Rock/Steel type).

abilities.name: Magnet Pull
abilities.desc: Traps STEEL-type POKéMON.
abilities.effect: Magnet Pull prevents Steel type Pokémon from switching out of battle or fleeing.

abilities.name: Galvanize
abilities.desc: Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.
abilities.effect: Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves and their power boosted.

abilities.name: Compound Eyes
abilities.desc: Raises accuracy.
abilities.effect: Compound Eyes raises the ability-bearer's accuracy by 30%.

abilities.name: Tinted Lens
abilities.desc: Powers up “not very effective” moves.

abilities.name: Oblivious
abilities.desc: Prevents attraction.
abilities.effect: Oblivious makes the Pokémon immune to gender-based moves and abilities, specifically Attract, Captivate and Cute Charm.

abilities.name: Own Tempo
abilities.desc: Prevents confusion.
abilities.effect: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming confused.

abilities.name: Regenerator
abilities.desc: Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.
abilities.effect: A Pokémon with Regenerator restores 1⁄3 of its maximum HP when switching out.

abilities.desc: Boosts certain moves’ power in a sandstorm.
abilities.effect: Sand Force raises the power of Ground, Rock and Steel type moves by 30% during a sandstorm.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.desc: Ups evasion in a sandstorm.
abilities.effect: Sand Veil raises the ability-bearer's evasion by 20% in a sandstorm. It also gives immunity to sandstorm damage (if they are not already protected by being Ground/Rock/Steel type).

abilities.name: Pickup
abilities.desc: May pick up items.
abilities.effect: When another Pokémon on the field uses a single-use held item, a Pokémon with Pickup will obtain the used item (if they are not already holding anything) and it can be used again.
